creator: Robert_Flaherty@Hyperion.com
text:
If we chain tasks and inheritAll="true" then

	<dirname property="ant.file.dir" file="${ant.file}"/>

will only be valid for the first task.  This property should have special 
treatment like ant.file.

No response; alternatives exist, the most obvious of which is that builds should
be relevant to ${basedir}, not dirname of ${ant.file}, if those two are !=.
creator: mbenson@apache.org
